long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CloneLink is a simple and easy to use Chrome extension for copying the current link of
your active tab to your clipboard.

Simply just click the button and a confirmation message will pop up saying that the link has been copied to your clipboard.

This extension will always grab the link of the website that is active on your current selected tab, even if you choose to edit or remove parts of the text of the link while still on the page.
